Hi,

I encountered a NullPointerException when reading ARC files containing
records with empty http header (from some broken servers).

To solve my problem I added the following to ARCRecord:

525a526,529
> //avoid null pointer in new String(byte[] statusBytes)
> if (statusBytes==null){
> statusBytes=new byte[0];
> }

see: http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1495

not sure if such a minor issue is worth spamming the list, but it would
be great having the small fix in the next release.

thanks and have a nice Sunday
 Holger
